question: This scheme aims to facilitate access to an integrated range of services including medical aid, police assistance, legal aid etc. to women affected by violence. Under the scheme, the government aims to set up One Stop Centres across the country to facilitate women. The scheme has been launched based on the recommendation of Usha Mehra Commission. This scheme is implemented with 100% Central assistance. The name of the scheme is _?
explanation: The GOI has launched the Scheme for setting up One Stop Centres called as SAKHI to facilitate access to an integrated range of services including medical, legal, and psychological support to women affected by violence to be funded through Nirbhaya Fund. This scheme aims to facilitate access to an integrated range of services including medical aid, police assistance, legal aid etc. to women affected by violence. Under the scheme, it has been envisaged that One Stop Centres would be set up across the country to facilitate women. The scheme has been launched based on the recommendation of Usha Mehra Commission.
